page.title: 02WORCESTER & BIRMINGHAM CANAL
page.content: In this area the{Worcester and {Birmingham canal}is in a very peaceful setting.It passes through a rural area.The canal has only 6 locks,situated at{Offerton.}Along the length of the canal there are two pubs providing refreshments.In{Dunhampstead there is a marina called{"Brookline {Boat Yard".}The marina operates 9 luxury barges from 45/56 feet in length, sleeping 2/8 people.Also in the marina there is a souvenir shop called{"The Forge Studio".}As you proceed you come to{Dunhampstead {tunnel}(236 yds long).The canal provides many opportunities for tourism to expand.Recreation forms the main part of canal life so making the canal an important part of the village life.
